scansIncluded.description: List of scans performed. If empty, all scans are included.

scansExcluded.description: List of scans which has not been performed. If empty, no scans are excluded.

minSeverity.description: Minimum severity level to include in the report and during the scan.

CWEsIncluded.description: List of CWE IDs to include in the report. If empty, all CWEs are included.

CWEsExcluded.description: List of CWE IDs to exclude from the report. If empty, no CWEs are excluded.

OWASPsIncluded.description: List of OWASP vulnerabilities to include in the report. If empty, all OWASP Top 10 API vulnerabilities are included.

OWASPsExcluded.description: List of OWASP vulnerabilities to exclude from the report. If empty, no OWASP Top 10 API vulnerabilities are excluded.
